column4: hi how do i install https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/poco? I think I need to add a ppa ? but what ppa code would do that? "sudo add-apt-repository ppa:someppa/ppa"
what would I use for someppa/ppa if I want that poco library?
or where can I find it?
those are in the regular repositories, no need for a ppa
